alert.note: Alert for Bladen (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 10:12AM EDT until April 13 at 10:34AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Carolina...South Carolina... Cape Fear River At William O Huske Lock And Dam 3 affecting Bladen and Cumberland Counties. Cape Fear River At Elizabethtown affecting Bladen County. Black Creek At Quinby affecting Florence and Darlington Counties. For the Cape Fear River...including William O Huske Lock And Dam 3, Elizabethtown, Lock And Dam 1...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Black Creek...including Black Creek Nr Hartsville, Quinby... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cape Fear River At Elizabethtown. * WHEN...From this evening to late Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, Flooding of farmers fields adjacent to the river will worsen. Larrimore Lane may begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:50 AM EDT Sunday the stage was 19.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 28.7 feet Tuesday evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued by this evening.
